title: BFUHS Notification 2026 - Apply Offline for Junior Pharmacovigilance Associate Posts
description: The Baba Farid University of Health Science (BFUHS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Junior Pharmacovigilance Associate Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS, BDS, and Pharm D can apply for the BFUHS Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit,...
